My thought exactly, Les.  Also, there will be a free (with museum admission=
) half day symposium on Sunday, November 8 with lectures by Morihiro Ogawa,=
 curator of the exhibition; Victor Harris, British Museum and The Japan Soc=
iety; Norio Suzuki, Director-General, National Research Institute for Cultu=
ral Properties, Tokyo; and sword polisher Okisato Fujishiro.  

Details can=
 be found at   http://tinyurl.com/odofqn

A catalog of the exhibition will =
be published:  9x11 75 b/w and 300 color illustrations, $65.  I don't know =
when that will be available.

Jim
